process.name: CalculateModel
process.description: Compute daily minimum and maximum soil temperature and update deep layer temperature using air temperatures, soil heat flux, and lambda; handles missing input sentinels.

inputs.name: exogenous_meanAnnualAirTemp
inputs.description: Mean annual air temperature used to initialize deep layer temperature.

inputs.name: deeplayerstates_deepLayerT
inputs.description: Deep layer temperature state at previous step.

inputs.name: ratesexternal_heatFlux
inputs.description: Soil heat flux from an external module.

inputs.name: lambda_
inputs.description: Scaling parameter for converting soil heat flux to available energy.

outputs.name: states_minTSoil
outputs.description: Computed minimum soil temperature for the day.

outputs.name: states_maxTSoil
outputs.description: Computed maximum soil temperature for the day.

functions.name: SoilMinimumTemperature
functions.description: Minimum soil temperature as the minimum of SoilTempA and SoilTempB.

functions.name: SoilMaximumTemperature
functions.description: Maximum soil temperature as the maximum of SoilTempA and SoilTempB.

functions.name: SoilTempA
functions.description: Energy- and meteorology-based soil temperature estimate using weatherMaxTemp, weatherMeanTemp, soilHeatFlux, and lambda_.

functions.name: SoilTempB
functions.description: Temperature estimate as the average of weatherMinTemp and deepTemperature.

functions.name: UpdateTemperature
functions.description: Updates deep layer temperature by smoothing with the mean of min and max soil temperatures.
